from_torus_knot(pd_idx_t p, pd_idx_t q) → PlanarDiagram¶

Torus knot. Only (2,q) is implemented for now.

Twist knot with n twists

from_unknot(pd_idx_t n) → PlanarDiagram¶

An n-crossing unknot diagram
